snippet: HUVANE--Susan, 78, died from pneumonia on February 6th. She was an artist, a patron of the arts, a graduate of The Ursuline School of New Rochelle and of the College of New Rochelle. She is survived by her sister, Mary Lowe (Albert), nieces, Grace Russak and Diane Desrosier and nephew, Adam Lowe. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HUVANE--Susan, 78, died from pneumonia on February 6th. She was an artist, a patron of the arts, a graduate of The Ursuline School of New Rochelle and of the College of New Rochelle. She is survived by her sister, Mary Lowe (Albert), nieces, Grace Russak and Diane Desrosier and nephew, Adam Lowe. 1/3
